metadata.title: Corsair CMFPLA3B-64GB Padlock 3 - USB Flash Drive - 64 GB, Blue, Black/Blue
features: 64 GB storage capacity allows you to store music, films and a variety of other personal and professional files.
By utilizing 256-bit AES encryption, keep all your personal files information safe & secure from hackers and thieves.
For super-fast data transfer take advantage of USB 3.0 connectivity.
description: Water Resistant, Shock Proof, and Completely Secure , shockproof, water resistant, the PADLOCK 3 USB 3.0 is a high performance flash drive designed to hold confidential and sensitive information. Files are securely protected from data theft with 256-bit AES hardware encryption, and security protocols that meet government standards. 256-Bit AES hardware encryption Fast encryption and strong data protection effectively secures 100% of data FIPS 197 Meets government level security standards including the Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) 197 requirement Ruggedized rubber housing Water resistant and shockproof ensures data protection in extreme conditions Platform independent authentication No need for special driver or administration rights and fully compatible with Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux PIN Pad Built-in PIN pad provides simple authentication with no additionalsoftware required USB 3.0 Ultra-fast read and write performance over USB 3.0 connection Ruggedized rubber housing is designed to stand up to the elements: water resistant and shock absorbent. Built-in PIN pad means no additional software is needed. PADLOCK is compatible with Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux-based systems. Ultra-fast read and write performance over USB 3.0 and full backwards compatibility with USB 2.0 and older standards.- 64 GB storage capacity allows you to store music, films and a variety of other personal and professional files.- By utilizing 256-bit AES encryption, keep all your personal files information safe & secure from hackers and thieves.- For super-fast data transfer take advantage of USB 3.0 connectivity.- Sold as 1 Each.
